remarks: The sum of a non-convergent infinite series evaluates to the empty set.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 4-Nov-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
statement:
isumcl.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
isumcl.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
isumcl.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) $.
isumcl.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) $.
sumnul.5 $e |- ( ph -> -. seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) $.
sumnul $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z A = (/) ) $.
$d F k $.
$d M k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
